20110107170248.000|20110107170252.000|TR0|WHITFIELD:  They're saying "We're free!"  
20110107170252.000|20110107170256.000|TR0|Mississippi freed the Scott sisters today 
20110107170256.000|20110107170301.000|TR0|on the condition one donates a kidney to 
20110107170301.000|20110107170305.000|TR0|the other.  The governor of that state 
20110107170305.000|20110107170309.000|TR0|says the release will save that state the 
20110107170309.000|20110107170313.000|TR0|cost of dialysis, about $190,000 a year.
20110107170313.000|20110107170317.000|TR0|
20110107170317.000|20110107170321.000|TR0|The sisters were convicted of an $11 armed 
20110107170321.000|20110107170325.000|TR0|robbery back in 1994. A judge gave each 
20110107170325.000|20110107170330.000|TR0|double life sentences for that crime.
20110107170330.000|20110107170334.000|TR0|
20110107170334.000|20110107170338.000|TR0|Within the last hour, the Republican push 
20110107170338.000|20110107170342.000|TR0|to repeal the health care reform law 
20110107170342.000|20110107170346.000|TR0|cleared a procedural hurdle in the House.  
20110107170346.000|20110107170350.000|TR0|The vote was 236-181, mostly along party 
20110107170350.000|20110107170354.000|TR0|lines.  This sets up a final House vote 
20110107170354.000|20110107170359.000|TR0|next Wednesday on undoing the health care 
20110107170359.000|20110107170403.000|TR0|reform, repealing that law.  The bill 
20110107170403.000|20110107170407.000|TR0|stands little chance of passing the Senate 
20110107170407.000|20110107170411.000|TR0|and surviving a presidential veto.
20110107170411.000|20110107170415.000|TR0|
20110107170415.000|20110107170419.000|TR0|Outrage is spreading over the deaths of 
20110107170419.000|20110107170423.000|TR0|two people in Arizona who were denied 
20110107170423.000|20110107170428.000|TR0|organ transplants because of budget cuts.  
20110107170428.000|20110107170432.000|TR0|Last week, the state legislature slashed 
20110107170432.000|20110107170436.000|TR0|$1.2 million in Medicaid funding for 
20110107170436.000|20110107170440.000|TR0|certain transplants.
20110107170440.000|20110107170444.000|TR0|
20110107170444.000|20110107170448.000|TR0|Federal matching funds went away along 
20110107170448.000|20110107170452.000|TR0|with it, and hospital officials say one 
20110107170452.000|20110107170457.000|TR0|man died after being denied a liver 
20110107170457.000|20110107170501.000|TR0|transplant.  The other needed bone marrow.
20110107170501.000|20110107170505.000|TR0|
20110107170505.000|20110107170509.000|TR0|Almost 100 other people have also been 
20110107170509.000|20110107170513.000|TR0|taken of the transplant list.  CNN's Kiran 
20110107170513.000|20110107170517.000|TR0|Chetry spoke with one of them.
20110107170517.000|20110107170521.000|TR0|
20110107170521.000|20110107170526.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)

20110107170530.000|20110107170534.000|TR0|RANDALL SHEPHARD, DROPPED FROM ARIZONA 
20110107170534.000|20110107170538.000|TR0|TRANSPLANT LIST:  About a year after I was 
20110107170538.000|20110107170542.000|TR0|placed on the transplant list, I received 
20110107170542.000|20110107170546.000|TR0|word that these cuts were on the horizon, 
20110107170546.000|20110107170550.000|TR0|there was a chance that this was going to 
20110107170550.000|20110107170555.000|TR0|happen from my nurse coordinator.  And she 
20110107170555.000|20110107170559.000|TR0|said, "Contact your state legislators.  
20110107170559.000|20110107170603.000|TR0|Contact everybody that you can.  We're 
20110107170603.000|20110107170607.000|TR0|working on our end to get the word out."
20110107170607.000|20110107170611.000|TR0|
20110107170611.000|20110107170615.000|TR0|And then, as of October 1st, I got the 
20110107170615.000|20110107170619.000|TR0|official call that I'm officially on the 
20110107170619.000|20110107170624.000|TR0|inactive list, and until either funding 
20110107170624.000|20110107170628.000|TR0|becomes made available, or I'm able to 
20110107170628.000|20110107170632.000|TR0|raise the funding myself, that it's not -- 
20110107170632.000|20110107170636.000|TR0|I'm not going to get my heart until then.
20110107170636.000|20110107170640.000|TR0|

20110107170918.000|20110107170922.000|TR0| It's $1.2 million. It's a minuscule part 
20110107170922.000|20110107170926.000|TR0|of our state's budget.  I've offered the 
20110107170926.000|20110107170930.000|TR0|governor 10, if not 20, options of things 
20110107170930.000|20110107170934.000|TR0|that we could cut.  Folks who are medical 
20110107170934.000|20110107170938.000|TR0|professionals in Arizona have offered up 
20110107170938.000|20110107170942.000|TR0|things that we could cut within our 
20110107170942.000|20110107170947.000|TR0|state's Medicaid program and just move 
20110107170947.000|20110107170951.000|TR0|that money to this transplant funding.
20110107170951.000|20110107170955.000|TR0|
20110107170955.000|20110107170959.000|TR0|People's lives are literally at stake at 
20110107170959.000|20110107171003.000|TR0|this point, and we have really got to just 
20110107171003.000|20110107171007.000|TR0|put all of this politics aside.  There are 
20110107171007.000|20110107171011.000|TR0|96 people still on that transplant list 
20110107171011.000|20110107171016.000|TR0|who have been told that they would receive 
20110107171016.000|20110107171020.000|TR0|transplants paid for by our state's 
20110107171020.000|20110107171024.000|TR0|Medical program, and many of which were 
20110107171024.000|20110107171028.000|TR0|added to the transplant list, had surgery 
20110107171028.000|20110107171032.000|TR0|scheduled, and then were sent denial 
20110107171032.000|20110107171036.000|TR0|letters after October 21st.

20110107171355.000|20110107171359.000|TR0|If you're on a transplant list because 
20110107171359.000|20110107171404.000|TR0|nothing else has worked you, and you're

20110107171424.000|20110107171428.000|TR0|but this is really expensive, this

20110107171727.000|20110107171731.000|TR0|were on that list in Arizona?  Could you, 
20110107171731.000|20110107171735.000|TR0|you know, be a -- in a position where you

20110107171743.000|20110107171747.000|TR0|me here?  Can I get on your list?  I've 
20110107171747.000|20110107171751.000|TR0|got this very desperate situation.
20110107171751.000|20110107171756.000|TR0|
20110107171756.000|20110107171800.000|TR0|COHEN:  It would be very hard to do, to go 
20110107171800.000|20110107171804.000|TR0|from one -- you know, first of all, you're 
20110107171804.000|20110107171808.000|TR0|sick to begin with.  To move to another 
20110107171808.000|20110107171812.000|TR0|state, get on their Medicaid list, you

20110107173703.000|20110107173708.000|TR0|saying that are surveyed by CNN Money,

20110107173712.000|20110107173716.000|TR0|million jobs will be added this year.  So 
20110107173716.000|20110107173720.000|TR0|that might make your current employer

20110107173724.000|20110107173728.000|TR0|

20110107173732.000|20110107173737.000|TR0|lot of uncertainty out there and, really, 
20110107173737.000|20110107173741.000|TR0|there's a lot of competition, because

20110107175550.000|20110107175555.000|TR0|supported by a nonprofit corp.  Yearly 
20110107175555.000|20110107175559.000|TR0|budget: $4 million.

20110107175603.000|20110107175607.000|TR0|GUTIERREZ (voice-over):  Monarch students 
20110107175607.000|20110107175611.000|TR0|are taught by credentialed teachers.  They 
20110107175611.000|20110107175615.000|TR0|also get free tutoring to make up for any 
20110107175615.000|20110107175619.000|TR0|gaps in education, and free medical and 
20110107175619.000|20110107175624.000|TR0|dental care.  And simple things to make 
20110107175624.000|20110107175628.000|TR0|life better like new shoes, a place to 
20110107175628.000|20110107175632.000|TR0|shower, and a laundry room to wash your 
20110107175632.000|20110107175636.000|TR0|clothes.
